__e: Hmm. Well, I'd just like to know what happened to that silver cigarette lighter, then.
You don't want to get your lighter back?
The other day, he ripped my bag with my golden lighter right out of my hand.
Again, John, all we want you to do is describe the current location of the agent that lighter belongs to and what he or she is doing there.
So why don't you give me the lighter and we'll talk about it?
She asked me for a light, and the moment I looked into her eyes, I knew that she was somethin' special.
